review: I have had the Chromecast for about 2 months now and it has totally replaced all of my entertainment streaming devices.  I use to use PlayStation or Blu-ray player for Netflix, Hulu, and Playon; but now I just the Chromecast.  The unit does get a little hot and I had to buy a short USB micro cable to power it from the TV without a big bundle of wires.  I will say that most APPS are not compatible with the Chromecast but since I have a Nexus devise I can use the cast screen and everything goes on my TV.
